p: Carla Ramos Cortés is a researcher at Navdanya International. Her work focuses on studying the worldviews that gave way to our current world system crises and the imperatives of agroecological food systems to pave a new path forward. She is an anthropologist, geographer and she holds a Master in International Development, with her specialization in topics of agroecology and traditional farming methods, the decolonization of worldviews and food systems politics.
